content.query:
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW user_sends_created
WITH(DISTRIBUTION = HASH (creation_date))
AS
SELECT
    CONVERT(Date, creation_date, 102) as creation_date
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN send_type = 'Text' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as text_sends
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN send_type = 'File' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as file_sends
    ,COUNT(*) as send_total
FROM [dbo].[send_creation]
WHERE source = 'user'
GROUP BY CONVERT(Date, creation_date, 102);
